akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibition against funding programs using abortion as family planning method

akn:content.akn:p: § 300a–6. Prohibition against funding programs using abortion as family planning method None of the funds appropriated under this subchapter shall be used in programs where abortion is a method of family planning. (July 1, 1944, ch. 373, title X, § 1008, as added Pub. L. 91–572, § 6(c), Dec. 24, 1970, 84 Stat. 1508.)
